title: What are the IT services that a company can provide? - Quora

response.answer_text: One service I provide is IT Outsourcing for small companies. This is for small businesses that can’t afford their own IT Department. This can be computer support, server support, website development, implementing software. Another service I provide in a different company is software development in the logistics industry. I own a portion of a software development company that sells their software to trucking companies. Another service I provide is for large companies that need temporary IT people on a contract basis.

What does an IT services company do? Here are some of the most common functions of the best IT consulting firms:Help you with your overall IT strategyData backup and disaster recovery planningAssist in the implementation of new systems/infrastructureHealth checks and auditsAt times, IT staffing or on-site servicesStudy your company’s business functions and improve your bottom line through an enterprise resource planning (ERP) softwareGenerally, hiring a managed IT services provider or an IT consulting firm helps you create an actionable set of methodologies that ensure success for your organization. However, 2020 has proved that there really is one thing constant in our life: unpredictability. But that doesn’t mean you should just leave your systems vulnerable to attacks - having an IT strategy specifically developed to meet your business needs is key to dealing with whatever issue you may encounter in the future.
